alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:52PM CDT until June 22 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Archer County in northern Texas... East central Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 552 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dundee, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Archer City, Dundee, Lake Kickapoo, and eastern Lake Diversion. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
